content: crochet flower bookmark materials - leftover yarn in the colors you prefer - scissors - 2 5 mm crochet hook - needle notes - i used a 2 5mm crochet hook to make this flower - the pattern is written in us term the first lager flower start by making a magic_ring make 10 double_crochet into the magic_ring close the ring and slipstitch into the first stitch to create the first petal make 6 double_crochet into the same stitch as the slipstitch chain 1 slipstitch into the next stitch to create the second third fourth and fifth petal *make 6 double_crochet into the next stitch chain 1 slipstitch into the next stitch repeat from * the slipstitch of the fifth petal is worked into the first stitch i personally also like to slipstitch into the back of the flower to make sure the petal is nicely rounded at the bottom bind of and cut the yarn and weave in the ends the second smaller flower start by making a magic_ring make 10 single_crochet into the magic_ring close the ring and slipstitch into the first stitch to create the first petal make 6 single_crochet into the same stitch as the slipstitch slipstitch into the next stitch to create the second third fourth and fifth petal *make 6 single_crochet into the next stitch slipstitch into the next stitch repeat from * the slipstitch of the fifth petal is worked into the first stitch bind of and cut the yarn leaving a long enough tail to attach attach the smaller flower to the larger one place the smaller flower on top of the larger flower and sew the two together weave in the ends the flower stem to make the stem of the flower you need to place the flower with the right side down find two loops near the edge and insert your hook into both of the loops yarn over and pull up a loop use the yarn tail to secure everything thight in place chain as many chains as you need to make your desired stem length the leaf at the end in the last stitches of the stem you will make a leaf start in the second chain from the hook single_crochet half_double_crochet 2dc 2dc half_double_crochet single_crochet chain 1 and turn into the back loops of your leaf you will make the other side of your leaf start in the back loop of the last single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet 2dc 2dc half_double_crochet single_crochet slipstitch into the first stitch bind of the yarn and weave in the ends
